A: ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πà‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏∞ Astro ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á JavaScript ‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å ‡∏ó‡∏≥‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ initial page load ‡πÄ‡∏£‡πá‡∏ß‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ ‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö interactive features ‡∏≠‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£ hydrate ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°

Astro + Sanity CMS Setup

This guide provides code examples for setting up Astro with Sanity CMS, including installation, configuration, schema creation, data fetching, page and component creation, and GROQ queries.
